summary: i came into an error in my game. hoping someone can help me and then send the save game back to me. (details below)
descriptionHtml:
the error i came across is i can\'t induct lydia, or any of my followers into the blades. i dont know why or how to fix it, but im hoping someone could induct her into the blades, save the game, and then send it back to me. :) im not sure if it\'s my save game that\'s corrupt, if it is let me know. thanks in advance.

- anyone who just wants the save game to play the game that\'s fine with me. im only level 14 but i hope you enjoy the game. 

Edit: let me know if this download works... this is my first upload.
author: VoidScarab
